meanings.definition: Of or relating to sound recording
meanings.sent1: The phonographic equipment captured the music perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The studio used phonographic technology to make the recording.
meanings.sent3: The phonographic device seemed to dance to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a phonographic record, playing back every detail.
meanings.sent5: The phonographic sound was so clear, it felt like the band was in the room.

meanings.definition: A device for reproducing sound from a record
meanings.sent1: I used the phonographic to listen to my favorite songs.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a beautiful phonographic on display.
meanings.sent3: The cat was fascinated by the phonographic and tried to paw at it.
meanings.sent4: The phonographic whispered the sweet melody of the past.
meanings.sent5: The phonographic filled the room with nostalgic tunes.

meanings.definition: A record or recording of sound
meanings.sent1: The phonographic held the voices of the past within its grooves.
meanings.sent2: She treasured the old phonographic of her grandparents' wedding.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child used the phonographic as a makeshift frisbee.
meanings.sent4: His words echoed in her mind like a broken phonographic.
meanings.sent5: The phonographic played the symphony of nature in perfect harmony.
